titles.title: Osananajimi ga Hisabisa ni Saikai shitara Otagai Kyonyuu ni Natteta
After Reuniting with my Childhood Friend
It Turned Out Both of Us had Become Tiddy Monsters
幼馴染が久々に再会したらお互い巨乳になってた
Long-Lost Pals Living Their Breast Life

title: Osananajimi ga Hisabisa ni Saikai shitara Otagai Kyonyuu ni Natteta
title_english: Long-Lost Pals Living Their Breast Life
title_japanese: 幼馴染が久々に再会したらお互い巨乳になってた
title_synonyms: After Reuniting with my Childhood Friend
It Turned Out Both of Us had Become Tiddy Monsters
synopsis:
You’ve heard of meet cute, but reunite cute? Now that they’re both grown up, newly swole Shun visits his old friend Nana after an extended absence hoping to put a (figurative) stake in the heart of his one-time first love. But it looks like neither of these tiddy monsters is ready to let go! Join our hilariously awkward (maybe?) couple as they (hopefully!?) begin to bumble their way into an adorable relationship!

(Source: Irodori Comics)
background: Osananajimi ga Hisabisa ni Saikai shitara Otagai Kyonyuu ni Natteta is a web manga released on the author's Twitter and pixiv accounts since June 27, 2020, and published in print by Kadokawa since January 18, 2024. The series has been published as doujinshi since January 25, 2021. The doujinshi series has been published digitally in English as Long-Lost Pals Living Their Breast Life by Irodori Comics under the Irodori Aqua imprint.
